channel.title: If you have patience, click
channel.description:
I used to play MoparScape servers about a year ago... and now I can see that it has advanced. Or I had the right downloads at the time and I didn't even know :p
I've been searching through tutorials to find out even how to play a server. Can someone tell me, in depth (for a noob), how to play a server starting with no previous downloads or knowledge about any sort of ANYTHING?
It'd be really nice :D

item.title: If you have patience, click
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

okay i will explain for you… So first thing you need is to download moparscape. you can do so here at moparisthebest.com look for moparscape v3.2 once you have moparscape you will install it there is a guide with that. after you have mopar scape you will open it and go to the moparserver status checker http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php find out what server you want to playon then copy that ip noramly “Something.no-ip.biz” or “something.no-ip.info” or “something.no-ip.org” then you will go to the top left of your screen and click on file and go down to new server. enter in that ip addy by ctr v and then click okay … type in any username and pass and then click log in

Read full topic
